structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Responsibility for enforcement of sex offender registration laws.

text.section: Each local law enforcement agency and the Department of Kentucky State Police shall each have the responsibility for enforcing the provisions of sex offender registration laws.

Law enforcement agencies may enter into written agreements for joint investigation and enforcement of violations of sex offender registration laws. These agreements may include other local law enforcement agencies and may include the Department of Kentucky State Police.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 139, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 15, effective July 12, 2006.
